articles.description: Chelsea appear to be stockpiling players, but do the owners have a plan in place at Stamford Bridge?
articles.title: Chelsea: Do owners Todd Boehly and Behdad Eghbali have plan for oversized squad?

articles.description: Arsenal agree a deal in principle worth up to 38.5m euros (£32.67m) to sign Spain midfielder Mikel Merino from Real Sociedad.
articles.title: Mikel Merino: Arsenal agree 38.5m euro deal with Real Sociedad in principle

articles.description: Jakob Ingebrigtsen blows away 1500m Olympic champion Cole Hocker with a dominant performance at the Diamond League in Lausanne.
articles.title: Diamond League: Jakob Ingebrigtsen beats Olympic champion Cole Hocker, Matthew Hudson-Smith & Dina Asher-Smith win

articles.description: England's Charley Hull shoots a superb five-under-par 67 to lead the Women's Open after the opening round at St Andrews.
articles.title: Women's Open 2024: Charley Hull takes one-shot lead after opening round

articles.description: Real Madrid goalkeeper Thibaut Courtois says he will not play for Belgium while Domenico Tedesco remains as manager.
articles.title: Thibaut Courtois: Belgium goalkeeper says he will not play under manager Domenico Tedesco

articles.description: Lando Norris says he has "not performed at the level of a world champion" this season - but still believes he can challenge for the title.
articles.title: Dutch Grand Prix 2024: Lando Norris still believes he can challenge Max Verstappen for Formula 1 title

articles.description: Emma Raducanu will face fellow Grand Slam winner Sofia Kenin in the Briton's first US Open appearance for two years.
articles.title: US Open draw: Emma Raducanu faces Sofia Kenin, Katie Boulter to play qualifier, Jack Draper v Zhang Zhizhen

articles.description: England full-back Kieran Trippier wants to leave Newcastle United before the transfer window closes.
articles.title: Kieran Trippier: Newcastle United defender keen to leave club this month

articles.description: Former Chelsea midfielder Conor Gallagher attempts some Spanish at his unveiling at Atletico Madrid with Julian Alvarez.
articles.title: Conor Gallagher speaks Spanish at his unveiling at Atletico Madrid

articles.description: Preview followed by live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Chelsea vs Servette in the Uefa Conference League.
articles.title: LIVE: Chelsea vs Servette: Uefa Conference League - live updates, score and stats
